Package pauseMenu.components

package pauseMenu.components
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ExitButton
    While the PauseMenu is triggered, if Enter key is pressed, the game will end.
    PauseButton
    Pressing the Esc key, if the pause param is set to false, the PausePanel will be set to visible and the objects in the main panel will be paused and viceversa.
    PausePanel
    The pause panel that will be visible if the pause is triggered.
